alert.note: Alert for Blair; Centre; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 10:05PM EDT until July 20 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Blair County in central Pennsylvania... Southern Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 1005 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Milesburg to Julian to near Tyrone, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... State College, Bellefonte, Tyrone, Park Forest Village, Woodward, Boalsburg, Pleasant Gap, Stormstown, Lemont, Bald Eagle, Zion and Houserville. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Snow Shoe and Lamar exits, specifically from mile markers 154 to 168. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 49 to 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To stay safe from damaging winds, stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
